rules_text:
Haste
[i]Reputation[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, if Julian dealt damage this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on him. Spells you cast from exile cost {1} less to cast for each counter on him.
[i]Locktouch[/i] – Whenever Julian attacks and isn't blocked, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.
